attributes.additional_details: There are many empty building on the side of railways which were once Britains bustling industry.  Lets aim to try and restore factories in British economy by first investing in.new equipment and investing in empty buildings by nationalizing them being government property.  Then make British industry nationalised to increase British economic growth.  Start on low wage for the first couple.of years until economic growth has boosted and increase and then allow.increase of wage and maybe possibly privatisation of factories after the growth.
